findings.title: Unprotected approve Function
findings.description: The approve function is publicly accessible without any access control, allowing anyone to call it.

findings.description: The skim function has been marked as vulnerable and may pose a security risk.

findings.title: Unprotected sync function
findings.description: The 'sync' function does not have any access modifiers and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unintended behavior.

findings.title: Unprotected Initialize Function
findings.description: The initialize function is declared as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized calls.
